item.title: 3D platform game Unity
item.description: Introduction After a 12-hour class at the Institut Polytechnique de Paris, where we explored the fundamentals of Unity, Pauline Spinga and I embarked on a creative project to model and develop a music-themed platform game named “Virtuoso”. In this game, players step into the shoes of Vivaldi, a character who has lost his piano and guitar and must embark on a journey through the changing seasons to recover his instruments while collecting musical notes along the way.
